CustomField.description: The planned total grant $ to be awarded under this allocation, calculated from the fields for number of grants and grant size
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Num_grants__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK( Grant_size__c )) , Num_grants__c * Grant_size__c, null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The planned total grant $ to be awarded under this allocation, calculated from the fields for number of grants and grant size
CustomField.label: Total allocated
